<WG1649> But Reproof <WG1161> Had <WG2192> Of His Own <WG2398> Wickedness, <WG3892> The Beast Of Burden <WG5268> Dumb, <WG880> In <WG1722> Man's <WG444> Voice <WG5456> Speaking, <WG5350> Forbade <WG2967> The <WG3588> Of The <WG3588> Prophet <WG4396> Madness. <WG3913>
